title: Colin Jost & Michael Che | Trump's Shutdown Is Making America Less Safe: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump is still holding the government hostage over his demand for a border wall as federal employees prepare to go another week without pay.

Then, he talks to Saturday Night Live's Colin Jost and Michael Che, who also take a few more questions backstage. Their bonus segment begins at 23:50.
